description:
A priest gains the power to control farts, a mother in law true colors are show, and brothers want to cook with a star.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shiri Naribera / Namida o Nagashita Oni no Men / Hoshi no Hi
The Farting Priest / The Demon Mask That Wept / Starfire
尻鳴りべら / 涙を流した鬼の面 / 星の火
